name: Slider Pong
description:
Move with A/D and the arrow keys.

The good ol PONG! play with a friend and see who can score more points! 

You can adapt the balance in the configuration of difficulty

My first complete game! Made on 14 days on winter 2020.

I would love to continue improving the game, but unity doesn´t take kindly games from old versions, so i can´t keep working on it :,(

Hope you enjoy it!
